title: Kites: a collage of kites and kite flyers
creator_credit: Compass Films (UK), Arts Council of Great Britain, Peter R. Jones and Simon Heaven
brief_description: Shows kites soaring above city heights, wafting across scenic countryside and displaying an array of designs, shapes and multi-tiered constructions. Explores kite mechanics, traditional patterns and characteristics and scientific and other practical applications of these fanciful toys. Includes live footage of kite experiments and archival stills of similarly innovative attempts of the past.
